about_the_game:
Heroine Character Generator 3, a software from Gee-kun-soft has arrived with the 3rd collection of brand new parts for creating amazing heroine characters!

Heroine Character Generator 3 makes it easier than ever to create original female characters for your epic RPG project by offering matching hairstyles, accessories, clothes and eye sets!

The more original characters you create, the more original your story becomes! So go ahead and get inspired with this new character generator!

Features:

* Clothes: 27 Female

* Accessories: 16 Female

* Front Hair: 4 Female
* Rear Hair: 8 Female

* Check out Heroine Character Pack 2 or Fantasy Heroine Character Pack 3 for a little inspiration to create your own original characters with this new generator!
